---Switchblade---

Switchblade watches Speedbreaker wander around slowly. "Fool, I 
am standing over here," he says walking towards Speedbreaker, 
decloaking as he goes. "I'll should be able to get you working." he 
says with certainty. His whips out two laser pistols, and the pistols 
fold and extend to form laser repair tools. Switchblade cloaks 
again, and begins work.


On 8 May 2001, at 17:13, robertdahl wrote:

> Wildrider, satisfied with his work well done, dodges the shells. He
> keeps his eyes on Incinerator, and starts to lower towards the ground.
> 
> Speedbreaker arrives back at the bunker of Decepticons. "Switchblade,
> I need repairs" he stutters in a sore voice.
>
